description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(spring_security_http_secured_requests_seconds_sum{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[10m]) / irate(spring_security_http_secured_requests_seconds_count{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[10m])

title: Spring Boot Statistics
